text: We love their Hawaiian Pizza. Its nothing like any other pizza place. Their delivery time is somewhat lengthy but that is my only complaint.
Quality ingredients, crafted from family recipes over years of perfection. Not only greay food but great service. Feels like family every time you walk in, I've never had a pizzeria feel like home.

New to Vegas, I picked this place solely because it was close and convenient. What a great surprise! We just got pizza to go but it was some of the best I've had; hot, fresh ingredients and perfect thin crust. Will definitely be eating here again!
Great pizza! Plus they deliver fast! Great people that work there and the east coast calzone is on !!

Best pizza in Vegas! Family business, if you go to eat there Biaggio will probably come out to chat, really kind guy. If not, they'll deliver anywhere in the whole city. I hardly ever eat salad but I can't help it here. The salads are always so fresh and delicious, but the pizza!!! Gotta try it.
Best pizza I've ever had in Vegas! Wings are also amazing and the owner Biaggio is one of a kind. Eat here!!!

Call me a snob if you want, but having recently moved fro northeast New Jersey to Las Vegas, I wasn't expecting to find great pizza.  And having tried several parlors, I found pretty much what I thought I would, okay but not great pizza.

Then I found Biaggio's ... I'll start by saying the marinara was the best I've ever had.  Tangy, a little sweet and not overly acidic.  The pizza ingredients were fresh and the crust was thin like it should be.

Biaggio's, you're my only pizza place in the wonderful little food mecca of Las Vegas.

Solid Meatballs and the garlic knots are to die for. 

I have eaten at Biaggio's 2 times now and I've had the 2 slice special each time and my girlfriend normally gets the meatball for us to split it all. The pizza is good for the price but I think there sandwiches especially the meatball sandwich is amazing. I think I heard it's an old grandma recipe for the meatball and they are great. Meadium sized but just right with soft bread. 

When we go we always get an order of garlic knots with the marinarra because they are a must have with any meal because they are delicious. 

Finish it all of with fried dough and your out the door for under a $20 eating for two. 

The Vegas Villains

I love this place!  My friend and I decided to check this place out because of the great reviews.  When we got in we were approached by Mr.Biaggio what a delightful person to meet.  He provides excellent service.  My friend and I ordered a slice of pizza; pepperoni, sausage and mushroom. OMG FRESH MUSHROOM, crispy crust and the sausage was perfect! We also decided to split a meatball sub, chicken wings and cannoli..Hahah I know it was a lot of food.. My stomach was so stuffed but i couldn't stop eatting it was sooooooooooo good...  We finally found our pizza spot and thank God he delivers anywhere in Vegas...

Best meatball sub I've ever eaten! Bomb Cesar salad too. Mr. Biaggio himself served us and was a real treat. 

You know it's good if he serves it to his own family. Location is off the strip but worth the trip. I highly recommend this place to anyone craving some good Italian food.

Finally tried Biaggio's the other day and I have to say one of the better pizza places ive tried in Las Vegas. We had the supreme pizza and the garlic knots. Garlic knots were very good! Honestly one of the better garlic knots ive tried! Pizza was also very tasty, the sausage was definitely my highlight! Service was extremely friendly and prompt! If your on the Southwest side, this is the place to go!
We had pizza here and it was awesome!  Small place, but great food and service.  Very delicious!  Can't wait to try some of their subs!

I was very excited to try this place based on the reviews; however, this was the worst service I have had in a long time. They said my pizza would be ready in 25 mins. I got there 30 mins after ordering and it wasn't ready. They asked me 5 different times what my order was and never followed up to let me know what the status was. They guy next to me was waiting longer than me and just ended up leaving. That should have been my sign. After an additional 25 mins of waiting, I finally got my order... Or so I thought. 
Got back home to eat my pepperoni, mushroom, olive pizza with a greek salad; and they gave me a green pepper, mushroom, olive pizza with an Italian salad. Needless to say, I was boiling! Why people like this place is beyond me. I tried to eat what I had but it wasn't even good. The dough was flavorless and nothing special. I won't be back and wouldn't recommend this place to anyone.

Food was exceptional and service was even better! The ingedients were fresh as can be. We had the greek salad, hot wings, and an Art of Chicken pizza. Though we stuffed ourselves, we didn't end up with that heavy junk food feeling. We left charged up and ready for our hike at Red Rock.  Thanks so much. Wish we had a place this good in Sacramento!

Still amazing, since my first review I have ordered about 5 times at least. I recommend this place to a friend that is a pizza snob, mind you I know nothing about pizza I mean of course I know the difference between homemade style and Pizza Hut. Anyway my friend is from the east coast he was blown away, he told me i was spot on. Great place worth the money, it tastes like heaven.

I've lived in Las Vegas for over 20 years and this is the best pizza in town! What's equally as impressive is that the owner is so hands on and takes pride in his amazing restaurant. Biaggio knows how to treat his customers. Thank you for the recommendation on the Caesar salad! Now I can eat more of your amazing cannolis!

Can I give it 100 Stars???  This place is out of this world amazing!
We were looking for a pizza place to take our daughter to for her 2nd birthday and got lucky enough to find Biaggio's.
The garlic knots and pizza are excellent, and made with the freshest ingredients.  But what truly makes this place stand out is the loving service we got.  
I believe it was the owner that made our daughter an order of zeppole and put a candle in it.  He brought it to our table, and sang Happy Birthday to Gia.  (Thank you Mr. Biaggio!)
We will make sure to visit this place every time we are in Vegas!  If you are lucky enough to live in the area, this should be your go to pizza place if it isn't already.
This place is everything you could hope for.
This is currently holds the best pizza place in my eyes. The pizza was perfectly made! I'm glad that this place is only minutes from my house. I highly recommend this place to anyone!

OUT OF TOWNERS BEWARE! I am staying at Mandalay Bay and telephone ordered a pizza and garlic knots for delivery from Biaggio's. NO mention was made of ANY delivery charge but a $6.00 "Strip Delivery Charge" was included when the pizza was delivered. To add insult to injury they omitted the garlic knots. The only saving grace, and perhaps most important, the pizza was very good.

UPDATE: About 30 minutes after I posted this review I got a call from Biaggio's apologizing for my "experience" AND removing any and all charges. Even tho I said he should charge me for the GOOD pizza he said he wouldn't do that. Talk about making things right and then some! I had originally rated my experience 3 stars because of the overall experience. Based on the totally positive attitude Biaggo has displayed, not because of any refund, I'm upgrading my star rating. Yay, I am indeed a fan! Terrific response by a business.

We stopped in one night when we first moved to the neighborhood and chose this place based off of Yelp reviews. The owner was our server and absolutely just sweet as can be. We got a pizza and it was absolutely delicious. Being from the east coast, we are VERY particular with our pizza- but we were VERY pleased. Service was great, food was delicious. We will absolutely be back and we look forward to trying more delicious items off the menu! Thanks again for great service and for feeding a very hungry family.

They accidentally delivered me the wrong pizza today (wanted sausage, got pepperoni, no biggie). I called just to let them know and they sent me the sausage pizza, let me keep the pepperoni, and gave me a $20 gift certificate. Wow, much more than I ever expected. 

I've never wrote a Yelp review but had to after this excellent customer service. This business is run the right way and their food is delicious. Highly recommended.

Phenomenal! Phenomenal! Absolutely Phenomenal! The food is so delicious; you'll keep coming back for more. So far I had their mouth watering pizza, garlic knots, chicken wings and artichoke salad and it was so worth it. Not only do they have great food but also have Awesome customer service, quality ingredients, kid friendly and clean establishment. 

The owner makes you feel right at home. Always pleasant and is very proactive in the community. 

If you haven't had the opportunity to go and dine at Biaggio's Pizzeria you definitely should put it on your to do list.
Awesome food and super friendly service.  Garlic knots are smothered in butter.  Marinara is chunky and rich.  Fast service.  Great food.

Pizza was hit and miss... sometimes it tasted very good, other times it was hard or soggy, but I leave this one star review for 2 reasons.  They both have to do with customer service. 

1.  We were delighted to find out that they would deliver to us even though we live way out East.... I also found on their website that it specifically says "We deliver anywhere in the valley!"  So they delivered to us 5 times as there really aren't that many decent options on the East side.  Even though some times they charged $4 for delivery and others they charged $8 we were ok with that and we still tipped generously.  When we tried to order for the 6th time, I was told they would no longer deliver to our  location.  Evidently his drivers are privately employed even though they are still representing his company.  

2.  This all probably stemmed from the 5th delivery where we ordered ONLINE over $70 worth of pizzas and calzones for a group.  The total actually came to around $72 (including $4 delivery which the website stated), when the driver arrived he told us the total was $83.  I even had him come inside and showed him the website with the totals.  Well, when the owner called me and informed me that his drivers refused to deliver to us he informed me that the problem was that I was going by the pricing on the website and that was not updated, the extra toppings had gone up by .25 cents each.   Well, I still struggle to see how this is my issue as they need to update their website pricing to reflect their correct amounts or turn off their online ordering.  I was a bit taken back by this interaction because it felt like I was being blamed for the price discrepancy when it had nothing to do with me.  So obviously, all of his drivers got together and decided not to deliver to my house anymore (because it was too far) is what I was told.  

Well bottom line is, they need to fix their website if they TRULY are not delivering ANYWHERE in the valley... otherwise, it's clearly just my house that they chose not to deliver to.  Also, they need to update their website to reflect their correct pricing and if it is not correct they need to stand by their prices as it's not the customer's job to know when they raise their prices.

Over priced and not that good.
The 3 piece chicken fingers for $8.99 is a joke. They are the size of fingers and they taste like something I could buy in the frozen section at the grocery store. If it came with fries I could understand the price a little more.
Chicken Parmesan Sub was just ok. Not much flavor and over priced.
Large meatball pizza is not the worst but is far, far from good. The crust was doughy. The sauce had little flavor. The cheese and meatball was ok.
Zeppole was the best thing there. I wish they were cooked a little longer but other than that I did enjoy them.
My family and I will not be coming back.
I don't understand how this place is getting so many good reviews.

*I just go a call from the restaurant. They read my review and because we were not happy with the meal they are not going to charge us for it. Because of this very surprising and honest business practice I'm am giving them one more star to make it 3. I may go back in for the zeppole.

One of the best pizza I've tried in Las Vegas!!
I placed order for a delivery online which was very convenience 
It took about 40 minutes, considering the distance (about 5miles) it was pretty fast.
I ordered meat lover, I loved it.! I usually leave crust when I eat pizza but 
I even loved the crust.
Went for the first time today. I got the supreme and it was amazing. I will be coming here for my pizza now. Sausage, crust veggies and sauce were all awesome.

I love this place. It's great for handouts and dine-ins. This place serves the best chicken wings and meatball dishes. I recommend trying their spaghetti and meatballs. The meatballs are homemade which makes it better! The chickens wings are fried and crispy to perfection!
     The owner is awesome! He was very friendly with all the customers, even though he's alone most of the time. When you walk into this restaurant, you will definitely feel like your home. :)

Excellent Cesar salad.
They also sell pizza by the slice which is great with affordable prices .
Too good!! The owner is one of the nicest people I've met. Seems like a genuine person that just want to take care of his people the right way. Will be back!!
Food was great. Can't beat that crust or the homemade sausage. Owner friendly,knowledgeable, and has a great new haircut!
1 of the best pizza places in town. Friendly staff and they have a great deal for 2 slices and a drink.

This place is absolutely fantastic. The owner is almost always here and ensures customer service and satisfaction is consistently delivered. Aside from excellent service, Biaggios offers really delicious food options. The pizza is fantastic with chewy crust with fresh toppings and high quality cheese that stretches when you take a bite or cut a slice away (I think that means the cheese is a blend of mozzarella and Munster cheese). The salad and garlic knots are bomb too. 
Additionally my job requires me to cater in lunches to my customers and Biaggios more than assists in getting my food delivered hot and on time and at a really reasonable price. 
I can't say enough good things! Give them a try!

Just Awesome!  

Went in here for the first time a couple of months ago.  Had the meatball sub.  I love the meatballs!!  Very tasty. While there the owner came by and asked if it was my first time here and I said yes, and then he gave me slice of pizza to try!  It was really good!  It is on the greasy side but that's what makes it taste so good.  I mean it wasn't overly or anything, just more taste than other pizza.  I don't know I loved it.

I also order out from time to time from this place.  The online ordering system is quite easy to use.  I don't beleive they give you a time of when they will deliver like some places but about 45 minutes sounds about right.  If they have any questions for you they will call you and ask.  I know one time I placed an order for meatball parm and I got the meatball sub and called it in and they made a return trip to give me the meatball parm :) that was very nice, I was more concerned that I received the wrong order! 

Very nice...very good on service too.  I've had no problems with them that they didn't take care of me.  Also the prices are not bad, very affordable.  I love eatting their parm, it's like spagetti and meatball but with baked cheese on top that's nice and gooy yum!  Always fresh and hot when it gets delivered...If I feel like staying home and getting some pasta this is my go to place. :)

Hello! My name is Drake Capital Ernest Hollingshead. To whomever may be reading this. I am a recent employee of this particular restaurant, and proud to be one. I feel honored to ever be a part of this restaurants Endeavors. Might I recommend their meat lovers Pizza? You can bet your bottom dollar that it will be baller. Might I add that it will make you want to holler? :-) that and much more. You've got my 5 stars, happy eating!

We were in town from Denver for my daughter's gymnastics meet. We all wanted pizza, but I'm gluten free so that can be hard to find. We checked yelp and found this hidden gem of a place. Ironically, they had a delivery issue with their GF crust, but the owner was very apologetic and accommodating. He replaced the pizza with ravioli for me - It was AMAZING!! And he gave us my daughter's pizza on the house. Between the fantastic customer service and the great tasting food I can enthusiastically give this place 5 stars. If you're in the Vegas area be sure to check it out!!

There are so many pizza joints in Las Vegas. However this place is by far the best! Thank you yelp for the great reviews. The portions were huge and the price is more than fair. What makes this such a great place to keep coming back to is the service! Thank you John!
Four Dena girls on a weekend getaway and what a pleasant surprise!! The food, atmosphere and service were awesome and Biaggio himself was the icing on the cake!

I am a relocated NYer who knows good pizza when I devour it.

Raves:

Very very impressed with their garlic knots and white sauce pizza with Ricotta, very memorable and delicious. The service was friendly and delightful. The place was clean and comfortable. Their pizza dough is excellent and they do crust really really well. Their homemade Marinara sauce is terrific. Definitely worth visiting and make sure you try the desert. It's big so bring a few people to help you finish it. 

Rants:
They need to improve their signage for visibility. Both on the pylon and on the front of their storefront. 
I was a little disappointed with the veggie calzone. It was cooked well but the veggies were not too cooked - kind of thrown in last minute and it was also light on the cheese. The positive is the size of the medium calzone was huge and I can't even imagine what the large calzone looks like!!! 

Bottom line: Good value, good experience ... I will crave your garlic knots and your white pizza.

Thanks!  

Phil
The Art of Chicken pizza is phenomenal! The veggie salad is also delicious. Cute little spot. We will be back for sure.

So I am going to once again post about Biaggio's since Yelp hasn't kept my review up.  Well my wife and I have been back to Biaggio's many times now ( 5 times I think) and the food has been great every time!  I read some of the reviews on here complaining about Biaggio increasing the size of food or giving them food while they wait or if they ask how something is!?!?!  Really people this is something to complain about?  I guess I am confused, people saying don't be bought by the owner Biaggio.  Well unless I am confused about the process of business, a business supplies a service, the public enjoys the service and wants more of it, thus returning many times to have the service again.  So by Biaggio giving AMAZING service and product; I am some how selling my soul.  THIS IS WHAT IS SUPPOSE TO HAPPEN AT A RESTAURANT!!!!  I guess some of you Yelpers have had such poor service for so long you have forgotten.  Look it is simple!
1.  AMAZING SERVICE
2.  AMAZING FOOD
3.  OWNER TREATS YOU LIKE FAMILY
4.  GO BACK OFTEN!!!
None of this means anything shady is happening.  If I owned a store I would want return customers and for them to tell people about my store, this is good business and what A LOT of restaurants in the Valley could use lessons in.  Stop reading so much into it and go enjoy good food with good people at Biaggio's.  Oh yeah I forgot to mention they deliver ANYWHERE in Vegas...who does that?  How is this not 5 stars.  I also will not try to compare this to pizza in NY or Chicago, it is great pizza in Vegas.  So unless you plan on going 2500 miles for a slice do yourself a favor and don't over think it.  Best pizza in Vegas.  BY FAR THE BEST SERVICE IN VEGAS!

First off, I have never written a review for anything on yelp. I wanted to write this review to share my  Biaggio's experience.  My wife and I live in Henderson and we were going to a church meeting in Summerlin. Instead of picking up the pizza's at our typical Henderson pizzerias, we decided to try a place closer to where the meeting was. I got on yelp and found Biaggio's. My wife placed the order online. Our meeting was at 6:30 and we got to Biaggio's at about 6:15.  It turns out they had the order wrong. They only made one pizza and it was the wrong pizza.  We ordered two.  We decided to wait for them to make the two we ordered. We sat down and Biaggio came to the table and immediately offered us drinks on the house. I said no thanks, we are in a hurry.  He then brought out an envelope with a $30 gift card.  We were shocked, this went above and beyond in customer service. A few minutes later, the pizzas we ordered were ready. We went to pay, and he wouldn't let us.  Everything was on the house. Not only did he give us the two pizzas we ordered for free, but also the pizza they mistakingly made, with wings and garlic knots. We couldn't believe it. we have never had better customer service. When we got there we were really annoyed, when we left, it was one of the best restaurant experiences we ever had.  By the way, the food was outstanding. Pizza was great and the garlic knots are out of this world.  Biaggio's is what all restaurants should be - great food and great customer service. We will be back.

Biaggio's is a great local pizza joint with a very friendly owner.  The pizza is New York style thin crust and is very good.  I've also had the calzone and Italian sandwich, both of which were great.  We always order the garlic knots to start and end our meal with the zeppoli for dessert.  Mr. Biaggio is a super nice guy and always makes sure everything is to our liking.  Highly recommended.
Love this pizza!!! My favorite place! Garlic knots are amazing! Owner is super friendly and lots of options for vegetarians.

I was a frequent patron for two years and I  have posted positive reviews on Yelp (often at Biaggio's request) and positive reviews on the local gluten free yahoo group as well.  BUT, I have used the delivery service only twice, and BOTH times they messed up my simple order, the second time sending a regular, non-gluten free pizza, which of course I could not eat. I live an hour away, so waiting for another wasn't practical. I decided to give them another chance tonight, but I wanted to speak with Biaggio personally first and let him know about the mistakes on the deliveries and help make sure it didn't happen again. I told him I would be upset if it happened again, and jokingly said I would post a bad review on Yelp if they messed it up. Instead of apologizing, he defended the restaurant saying, "It's just a pizza and people make mistakes. I'm going to decline your order and wish you on your way." Ironically, he was upset that I didn't call and speak to him about the mistakes(at the time), but this is actually what I was just doing and he refused to let us eat there anymore as punishment. Turns out the service isn't that great after all! Fortunately there's no shortage of restaurants in Las Vegas.

What a great place! We found Biaggio's with the help of Siri (when we asked for best-rated pizza near us) and she suggested Biaggio's.  We didn't know what to expect when we pulled in since the parking lot and surrounding stores were empty, but when we walked in, there was a bustle in the air, laughter, and the sound of people having a good  time.  The man that greeted us with a smile and rose from the table to meet us ended up being Mr. Biaggio himself.  What a gracious host, I felt like I was in his home.  Our waitress was a delight, and we started our order with the garlic knots.. my boyfriend didn't like the last batch from Angelina's, so he was very skeptical.  The picture on the wall of the garlic knots got his attention and we ordered 2 orders (I love garlic bread!).. he ordered wings and then we got two separate pizzas, mine was the chicken with artichoke and olives.. I ordered with spinach instead of the chicken since I am a vegetarian and they were able to accommodate with a smile.  My BF ordered the Meat Lover's pizza and thought the meatballs were to die for.  The crust on our pizza was simple and delicious, bordering on flaky.. the color was even and cooked to perfection!  We even took pictures of our pizzas, they were so gorgeous.  And they tasted just as good!  Mr Biaggio sat with us for a while and was so very pleasant, even telling us some Italian cooking secrets (!).. (we love the carrot in the tomato sauce to reduce acidity) while he sat with us.  I got bad news by telephone while I was finishing dinner, and Mr. Biaggio even gave me a hug when I left.  How thoughtful and genuine.  What a dear man, I liked him very much.

There were lots of people who came and went for carry-out while we were there, so I know they are popular.. and they should be!!

Our experience was the BEST, and we will come back again and again!  Luckily for us, we live in the area, so we can get delivery!!!

I went to Biaggio's because of all the positive yelp reviews on here. . . they did not disdapoint.  They serve real pizza here.

We ordered the white pizza, it was awesome. The mozz was fresh and the ricotta was smooth and creamy. No one ingredient on the pizza was overpowering, a rarity in my opinion. The crust of thr pizza was perfect. PERFECT. It was thin, crispy but not burnt, and completely cooked. The crust was what really made the pizza and what will keep mr coming back.

The only reason I didnt rate it five stars was because the pizza had too much oil on it for me. Also, I wasnt the biggest fan of the decor, i dont think that the oversized pictures of food fit this place very well.

Biaggios is pizza without equal in west las vegas, give it a shot you wont be dissapointed.

Nastiest pizza I've ever had made me sick for a week couldn't get off the toilet on top of that I paid some crazy price $28.00 for a large pizza delivered never again would I go here or recommend this place to my worst enemy I'm astonished by this crappy place trying to sell garbage

Better than Metro, and 1/2 the $!

Okay so I just moved to this area a few weeks ago, so I checked yelp to see where the good places to eat around here are. Saw the reviews, had to find out for myself.

I've been disappointed in the "quality" of good pizza places in Vegas since I moved here 4 years ago. Every place either had bad pizza, or was just too expensive. Biaggio's finally broke that trend. Great pizza, awesome ingredients, and Biaggio himself came over to my table to make sure that everything turned out okay. I got to tell him that I worked at a church, so he told me that if I brought the kids by he would hook us up with a deal. That always means a lot to me when someone runs a great business, and cares about the community!

Only downfall to the place is that it's the chick fil a of pizza places. (not open on Sunday) Also I would probably never go there to watch any sporting event, because of the lack of viewable T.V.'s

Anyway I give it 5 stars. I base that on: quality of the pizza, service/owner, and the garlic knots (you're not getting the whole experience if you don't get them)

This is my very first interview on YELP.. so I am not sure it will stay on the page.. or go to a filter. 

Biaggio's Pizzeria on Flamingo/Fort Apache was right next to a salon that I worked in, and this pizzeria is fantastic. I think it's a "little known secret" that no one knows about yet. Even though the owner (Biaggio) has an extensive menu, I always opted to order one of my favorites: "the Art of Chicken". Which is a homemade pizza topped with chicken (of course) (and lots of it), fresh artichokes, amazing roasted tomatoes (that I think makes the pizza so mouth watering), garlic and black olives. My habit of ordering was to get a slice of the Art of Chicken (which is crispy on the bottom; not too think and definitely not thin) and loaded with all of the ingredients above. (With a side of Marinara sauce). Biaggio's chefs are very ample on the portions... and I used to always order that traditional orange soda in a bottle called .. hmmm.. I cannot quite remember. 

Oh yes, when I first met Biaggio he told me that his wings were the "best". At the time, I did not believe him. I thought he was using a "sales pitch" on me. So I declined buying any. Well.. because I worked right next to his building, a few feet in my beauty salon next to his restaurant.. he sent over one of his chefs (a few minutes later).. with a full order of deep fried wings... complimentary just for me to try. YOU HAVE TO EAT THEM HOT and right when they are made. He was right!!! These were the best wings I have ever tasted. The skin and the batter was super crunchy and had an amazing taste. The chicken wings and legs themselves.. melted in my mouth.. literally. Not sure if I had chicken that ever did just that. But I only order them when I know I don't have to share. Biaggio simply is the BEST out there.. just like you are in NYC. (Love you Biaggio) (from your favorite flower Rose).

We drove from Aliante to here because of reviews. I had been asking my bf for 3 weeks to make the drive Bcz of the reviews. Since Ciao Ciao closed we are ruined - only secret pizza in the cosmopolitan has helped w our craving.
Pros: 
young lady @ register was super nice
Ranch dressing was good

Cons: 
beeping noise on register
Crust has NO taste/texture
Food needs garlic
Salad lettuce was not fresh
Display of cold pizza in glass has u ask is this going to be cooked or do we order fresh
No menu board behind register-u hv to read a menu@ register.
We waited awhile so ordered a salad Bcz we were starving & then they gave free apps to the booth behind us for waiting wtf! 
Bottom line: pricy-& I don't get the other rave reviews- there's 3-4 reviews like mine that are spot on.waste of $$$ & gas
They have amazing food and the owner really goes the extra mile to make sure that you feel welcome and appreciated.
FABULOUS!! The Sunshine pizza is awesome, the garlic is the best part. =) Thank you Biaggio and Christina and the wonderful cooks!!

We happened upon this place after searching Yelp while in the area and I'm sure glad we did.  Biaggio was very friendly.  We both ordered a sandwich and cannoli.  The Italian sandwich was amazing and by far one of the best sandwiches I've ever had.  Since neither of us ordered a slice of pizza, Biaggio brought over a slice for us to try while our order was being prepared.  The pizza had great flavor and crispy thin crust...perfect.

This place is AWESOME!  The food is fantastic and Mr. Biaggio has to be the nicest man ever!  My husband and I have decided that this is the only pizzeria we wish to go to in the future!  

I've tried several of the pies and they are all delicious! The garlic knots are amazing and so is the antipasto salad! The quality of the food and service make this pizza joint #1 in my book!

WOW. Amazing and fresh pizza, sandwiches and salads. AND vegetarians/vegans and the gluten-sensitive are in luck too! As they have a gluten-free pie crust (which is to DIE FOR it's sooo delicious) and gluten-free salads too. They will also remove meat items from any pizza to create a veggie option, including removing the cheese for vegans! Talk about customized pizza. And the portions are great big sizes and some items are family recipes...so they're homemade and incredible. And the owner, Biaggio, is just delightful! Spent most of our dinner chattin' it up with him while we were there. :)  I hightly recommend this pizza place. Really one of the best I've found in Vegas. Thanks for the amazing dinner last night!

Wow. Fail. We used to order food with them a lot, particularly because I have celiac and they're known to be celiac safe. 

Tonight we ordered - all from their specific Gluten Free Menu - gluten free chicken Parmesan, gluten free cheese ravioli, and a gluten free Caesar salad. Usually we get pizza. 

Upon opening our food containers, the ravioli were not great but decent (and I hadn't had ravioli in years!) and the gf chicken Parmesan came with spaghetti. My boyfriend and I shared both items. After we were halfway through both dishes, we took the salad from the bag and saw that it had giant croutons on it. I even gave them the benefit of the doubt and thought those might be gluten free - until we called. 

We were informed that they had messed up our order and the gf chicken Parmesan was supposed to come with gf ravioli; the spaghetti were never gluten free!! We were refunded but that doesn't make my stomach ache go away. 

Please don't trust them if you have celiac. I'm really sick now just because they can't read and/or process orders right.

Never again, Biaggio. I hope the owner reads this so he can understand how serious celiac is. I work in food service, and if I served gluten containing food to someone with celiac I would be fired before I can say celiac! Very, VERY upsetting. Please don't come here. These people do NOT care about their customers.

I love this place! We keep going back for more garlic knots and Biaggio's homemade sauce straight from his Aunt Angelina! The environment is very friendly and the customer service is impeccable! 

We have tried the sandwiches, pizza's, salads, garlic knots, and best of all---the Stromboli! Everything feels very high quality. :)

So,  being new to Las Vegas,  and having a wife with a serious gluten allergy,  we have been seriously dismayed by so many restaurants without a gluten free menu,  or a super skimpy gluten free menu. 

We called and were told they had many gluten free options.  Being skeptical based on our experiences so fast,  we decided to take a chance. 

It is located in a strip mall,  small and pleasingly intimate with outdoor seating.  As soon as we entered,  there were smiles all around.  We immediately felt welcomed and comfortable. 

The menu is awesome,  and they had examples of their menu in a display case.  It looked incredibly delicious,  and smelled amazing. The staff went to great lengths to explain the gluten free options,  and even shared their own story of celiac disease and how it impacted their menu. 

We ordered 3 pizzas,  all different and special,  including a gluten free pizza.  The food was  AMAZING!  Great flavor,  perfectly done and obviously made with care.  Most importantly,  my wife's pizza was incredible,  and it was good to see her smile as she ate.  

After driving a ways to get there,  we decided it was soooo worth it,  and we will be making them our go to spot for Italian food.  The stromboli looked awesome,  so that will be my next order.  And guess what...THEY DELIVER!!  Even way out to my house! 

We are most definitely fans and loyal customers from here on out.

Dreadful. I ordered it crispy or well done. It was soggy. Gross. About as appetizing as soggy underpants. The cheese and toppings can't even stay on. I think they forgot it was a delivery and let it sit. They also fuck you on the toppings. A buck for six jalepeno slices? A 20 dollar pizza that tastes worse than a 5 dollar shit pizza from little Ceasars. Save your money. The hunt for good pizza in Vegas continues. Just not here.

My husband, son and I truly enjoyed the service and food! Great Meatball sandwiches, chicken wings are delicious and the brownie cheesecake we had was amazing! Met the owner Biaggio he was very friendly and kind. The waitress was also a sweetheart! Loved this Place! We will be back!

Craving a cheesy pizza with lots of fresh toppings? You're looking in the right place!

We ordered to go: meat lover's + ricotta.  Sauce is nice, not too sweet or acidic, and not overly sauced. Lots of toppings, very fresh. Generous on ricotta. The only thing I wasn't a fan of is the crust. It's a little thick for my taste, but nice chew and not too doughy.  

Had a little hiccup with our order, but the owner was very gracious and handled the situation beautifully. Will def be back and recommend to friends. After all, who doesn't love to support local businesses (instead of chains)?

I work nearby and order their lunch special from time to time. 2 slices and a drink for 6 bucks, or 1 slice and 3 garlic knots and a drink for 6 bucks, can't go wrong either way when I feel like cheating on my diet haha. Everyone is really nice too!

This place is the best. The owner knows my name I go so often. I have never had a problem. The food is amazing. All fresh ingredients.

The first time my friends and I walked in, everyone made us feel like family. 

I hope this small business is able to make it!

I decided to try this place because it's close to my apartment.  The pizza is okay, it didn't have much sauce or flavor compared to Pizza Rock and Grimaldi's.  We ordered a 12" with pepperoni, ricotta, and basil for $21.  Seems slightly over priced for the size and quality.

I tried Biaggio's for the first time tonight. It's in my neighborhood, the prices are competitive, and the reviews here were enough to make up my mind.

I placed a carryout order for a medium cheese pizza and a garden salad w/ ranch. Easy order, fine way to test the waters, and even if it's bad, it's good.

It took them longer than stated on the phone, no big deal, I waited for about 5 minutes in the restaurant. Biaggio introduced himself to me. Nice guy.

I get home, and the $5.50 garden salad was *tiny*. I think they incorrectly gave me a side salad. I called, spoke to Biaggio's son John, he asked what they could do to correct it and I told him it was not a probleml, I just wanted them to know. He was very polite and told me that the next meal was on the house. 

Now, the food: The salad was fine. No complaints about quality. The pizza was fine too. It's hard to be objective about pizza. I didn't prefer their pizza, as I like a thinner crust and crispier texture. But there was nothing "wrong" with it. The flavor was good, and the blend of cheeses was nice as well.

 I would advise others to try it. You can't beat the price, and the customer services was above average for Las Vegas. Pizza preference is subjective, so I can certainly see why so many others rave about Biaggio's.

THIS PLACE is the BOMB! After a year I remembered I owe this pizza place a review. Not only does Biaggios have incredible quality pizzas, they also have the best service of any restaurant I've been to.  About a year ago my friend and I came to pick up an order we had called in.  After arriving and about to pay, we both realized we didn't have enough money to pay for our meal.  I had left my wallet at a different location and immediately was bummed and told them the situation and that I was sorry that we had a pizza made for nothing.  The amazing Good Samaritan behind the counter let us take the pizzas for free!!. I owe this place big time. The pizza was delicious and while in Vegas, it was the only quality pizza I would have. Besides being the BEST pizza in Vegas, it also has the BEST staff I've ever encountered.  I hope my review convinced you to support this pizzeria and once you try it, you will taste what the fuss is all about.  EAT HERE! QUALITY

I have nothing but wonderful things to say about this place and the owner. I was so impressed by the personal, genuine service and attention my wife and I were given. The food was absolutely delicious and left me totally full and satisfied. We will absolutely be going back and we are so thankful we found this little gem!

A freind told me about this place. Biaggios was a great experience the food was amazing I eat out a lot and this is truly great food and the owner was wonderful explained the menu and the food he sources top quality product and you can tell when you taste each item.  I can't wait to go back and enjoy more of the menu choices and great company there. The zeppoles deserts is to dye for.

Words can not describe this pizza. GO!
We visit every time we are in Vegas. The owner is super nice. The food is amazing. Love Love LOVE this pizza.

Great pizza and super great service.  Will definitely go again next time in Vegas.
Young shaved headed great looking guy you treated us like gold, thank you again!

Brought a team of 14 hungry football players here for there post tournament dinner. Friendly service was only outdone by the great food. Stromboli was excellent and the pizza was awesome! Order half sizes unless you bring a monster appetite.
Best pizza I've ever had! Hands down best prices for the amazing pizza they serve. Great service and amazing owner who goes above and beyond for his customers!
Oh my gosh, this pizza was great. I ordered Hawaiian, and it was amazing! I recommend this to everyone! The Philly Cheesesteak was one of the best I've had. :9

Biaggio is a liar! plain and simple, He brags about his family recipe for meatballs! Well they come frozen out of a box from the back of a Sysco food services truck!!! There is NO difference between the meatballs at biaggios and any other meatball delivered by Sysco to any other restaurant in the world. The ONLY difference is the lies that biaggio spreads about how they are a family recipe made by Analisa or whoever, it is all a lie! AND there are cockroaches in the place, if you dont believe that just go around the back of the place and outside the backdoor sitting on the ground are two large gray Ecolab roach baiting stations! Yes biaggio is pretty good at lying through his teeth and making people think he is something special but he is as fake as whatever that thing is that crawled up on his head and died! Yeah Its a cheapshot at a bad rug, but once you see how bad the rug is you can see how pathetic this liar is!!!

Food was fantastic, service was even better. We came to Biaggio's for a team dinner after a soccer tournament.  Mr. Biaggio had reserved the place for us and had nice hot food ready when we got there. The boys ate and ate and ate! I was a little hesitant to go because I have to eat a gluten free diet. Mr. Biaggio catered to my every need. He made me the best gluten free pizza, chicken Caesar's salad and cheesecake.

I eat here every day for lunch. The owner Biaggio treats us wonderfully and the environment is very pleasant. The food is delicious, he goes out of his way to recommend variety that I may like since I do eat there everyday. I recently tried the breakfast pizza, it is fantastic very unique and very, very good. I would and do recommend that anyone eat here, definitely five stars.
Believe the reviews. Wings were plump and crispy, garlic knots buttery and garlicky, sandwiches loaded, and they treat you like you come in there all the time. Will try the pizza next.

This is one of the best places to go to in Vegas, the people there have a great attitude, the food is excellent, and place has awesome service A++++++++ all the way. The owner operator is one of the nicest people you'll ever meet in your life, I highly recommend   this place!!!

I came here because of the high yelp review.  Unfortunately this restaurant is an example of yelp not working.  They repeatedly talked about yelp, and gave us free appetizers and gave us large pizzas instead of the mediums we ordered.

The pizza was not very good.   The crust was tough, the sauce was bland, and the cheese was of a low quality.  The garlic knots were made from the same dough as the pizza and as a result were not very good.

The people working there were really friendly, but friendly does not equal good pizza.  They should spend less time working on their yelp reviews and more time working on their recipes.

Thank you so much for making my husband's birthday party such a wonderful success.  We had the most delicious salad (greek was amazing) pizza (all fantastic) and stromboli (delicious and our 1st time having one)  The owner was so helpful and generous with us and we loved our meal so much.  We look forward to visiting Las Vegas again and having Biaggio's delivered to our hotel room!!!

Just had dinner here. Really good. I ordered a Supreme small minus the green peppers. Because who eats green peppers on pizza?! Anyways - very tasty and I will return. Only one unisex bathroom but that didn't effect the food at all. The gentlemen behind the counter appeared to be owners or what have you. They seemed to be enjoying their jobs and smiling even tho they were busy. That kinda charm I always tend to notice. Great little shop you have there!

Maybe I've become a pizza snob.... or Grimaldi pizza whore (oh, can I use that on Yelp?)  Okay under aged children turn away, go to mama.  After reading all the hype on Yelp for Biaggio, I was excited and intrigued.  Could there really be a good pizza place so close to my house?  Game on the hubby and I said, we want some good homemade pizza.  We ordered a large pepperoni and pineapple pizza and it sucked.  Two thumbs down, just sucked.  The crust tasted liked Red Rock pizza crust.  The cheese and sauce is nothing special.  Nope, not coming back.  We didn't even eat the leftovers.  hence, the hubby and I will continue to whore ourselves out to Grimaldi or Settebello.  -M2
Everything fresh! They use nothing frozen. Absolutely perfect crust. Very friendly staff.

I feel like I really need to review them again. I don't know how anyone can make a pizza that's so good. The meat lovers pizza absolutely blows me away. They've spoiled me for any other pizzeria. Hands down, the best pizza in Vegas.

Incredibly friendly service, Wi-Fi, and great food! Tried the Garlic Knots, Art of Chicken Pizza, Italian Sub and The Zeppole. Everything was great the Zeppole alone is enough of a reason to go back, which I plan to.

Erica, the concierge at The Signature at MGM Grand, recommended this amazing pizzeria for us to try.  Absolutely delicious chicken and artichoke pizza made by hand with fresh ingredients.  The chicken wings were unbelievably good, and the high quality oil they use for them provided a wonderful crispness and flavor.  Best of all they deliver!
Great friendly service!  My cheat day was better then expected! It's absolutely a must! Get the white pizza!

Good food. Pizza, wings and salad. Next time Alfredo or Ziti!
Great customer service and reasonable prices.

Loved this place. We had a pepperoni and meat lover's and both were just fantastic. Best pizza's I've had in a long while. The garlic knots are fantastic as well. Hello to Bro. Biaggio and family from your new friends in West Jordan. Next time we are in Vegas, one of our stops will definitely be pizza and garlic knots.
Very good customer service, excellent food. They're bbq chicken pizza is bomb.com

This place is AMAZZING!! If customer service is important to you you will not be disappointed! The owner is a sweet older gentleman who truly cares about his customers! He took the time to explain his pizza secrets with us! He even thanked our party a couple of times for coming in. He's funny too. Now about the pizza, it was excellent! Best crust ever! I will definitely be back! 10/10

This was the best pizza we have had-such a wonderful variety of things to eat and of the very best ingredients.  LOVE LOVE LOVE the little known "Irish-Italian" Stromboli that is savory and satifying.  The Vegi Salad with artichoke hearts and dried marinated tomatoes if perfect.  The Zepoli is so soft and tender and served perfectly warm with raspberry and white chocolate sauce that it should be eaten first!  If you are not in the mood for that, anything else served here is delish and "to die for" as well with the owner/master chef coming up with new recipes all the time.  Yum!

Updated my original review from 2 stars to 3 stars.  The reason being is that I probably dried out the pizza by putting it in my oven for an additional 5 minutes to make the crust crispier.  So that's probably my fault the pizza turned out dry.  I had the white pizza and added chicken.  There wasn't much sauce so the pizza dried out and skimpy on the chicken.  I've ordered here more than once and the toppings on other pizzas weren't very generous compared to the price of the pizza.  Crust is also too soft and flimsy for me.  Sorry, but this is just my honest opinion.

Grabbed two pizzas for take out. Place is kinda small but staff very friendly. I was offered a free drink while I waited which was really nice. Waited maybe 12-15 min. Pretty quick. Had the chicken artichoke pizza which was amazing and a supreme pizza which was great as well. Zeppole for dessert....these were incredible!! Soooooo addictive. Huge order too. Was a bit pricey but for gourmet pizza, it was worth it. I would definitely order again!
Quite possibly some of the best pizza out there and their Cannoli, "forget about it".

I have eaten at Biaggios a couple times but I have to say their food maybe average but definitely very over priced. I ordered chicken finger my order came with 3 pieces and no fries so I ordered a side if fries they were $4 and I was do unimpressed $15 dollars later for this tiny meal i will not go back.

Visiting Las Vegas and went to Biaggio's to try the gluten-free pizza. Had an awful version of it at Sammy's Woodfire Pizza the day before. The owner made a fantastic pizza for us. The crust was thin and crisp, and the sauce, cheese and toppings had wonderful taste and depth of flavor. 

The restaurant is clean and inviting, and we enjoyed meeting the owner. Overall a wonderful experience. We plan to be back.

Best salads pastas and Stromboli in las Vegas! We had the greatest experience here not only because the food is excellent but the staff is so courteous and welcoming. The owner Biaggio is also very accommodating and kind which just adds so much more to our culinary experience. Best Italian food in Las Vegas!!

My husband and I were looking for a place to grab a bite after playing volleyball at Gardens Park and found Biaggio's on Yelp.  Having moved here from NYC, we've had all kinds of great pizza and are pretty picky with what we find in Vegas.  We started out with some fantastic garlic knots.  They were perfectly seasoned on a pool of olive oil and also came with some tasty marinara sauce.  Take your pick on which to dip them in!  I did both!  We had a medium-sized (6 slices) "Art of Chicken," which had chicken, artichokes, roasted tomatoes, garlic, and black olives.  Delicious!  The pizza dough tasted great.  I love artichokes and roasted tomatoes and these were as fresh as you can get.  It's great having a slice of pizza with quality ingredients.  We got to speak to the owner while we dined at one of the outside tables and you are immediately aware of the passion he has about his food.  I love to cook so can appreciate that.  Service was really generous and nice, too.  We'll be back next time we're in the neighborhood to explore the other specialty pizzas on the menu.  This place doesn't take pizza for granted.  5 stars for quality ingredients and quality service.
Amazing Italian food - everything is awesome which makes it so hard to choose what to eat.   The owner is incredible and welcoming too.   We will be regulars for sure!!

It's going, it's going.......... IT'S GOOOOOOOOONNNNNNNNNNNNNE! Yet another yelp home run. 

Great pizza! Big beautiful boulders of savory sausage. I love the chunks of sausage oh so much and the chunks on our pizza were yum yum yummy and juicy. The sauce was really tasty as well. Savory and slightly sweet. Not too much or too little, the perfect Little Red Riding Hood amount; just right! Good quality cheese blend in just the right amount as well. The pepperoni was spot on as well; leaving just enough orange grease to let you know it's there but not so much it was dripping all over the place.

Bottom-line; not the best pizza I have had in Vegas, that still belongs too Old School, but certainly the second best, with the added bonus that Biaggio"s is 5 minutes from my house and not 45 like Old School.

The antipasto salad was great! Huge! Yummy! Loaded with everything you would want in an antipasto and one thing you wouldn't expect: dill pickle slices. Huh? But when all was said and done, they fit right in. 

Only one thing that I would mention on the negative side is that the pick-up order that was supposed to take "20 minutes" took 45. I placed my order on-line, which was easy enough.

Thanks Biaggio's, and thank Yelpers for this place!

Excellent customer service! It's my first time to order pizza from them. I live in Cali and im here in vegas for the summer staying with my brother. My brother already told me they have the best pizza here in vegas. When i did my order imentioned that i wanted it to be delivered to the clubhouse since me and my other brother who is vacationing from the philippines will be at the pool. It was delivered very fast. Pizza was really really good. We ordered the white pizza with sausage. And one thing that really amazed me was that they also gave us paper plates coz i mentioned we'll be at the pool. I didnt request for it but they are thoughtful enough to give it. Excellent food. Excellent customer service! :)

Fantastic pizza! Best we've had since moving to Vegas. The crust is just the right blend of crispy and chewy. The pizzas are made with fresh ingredients and no added salt or sugar in the crust or sauce. The owner is passionate about his food and the quality shows.  The entire staff makes you feel at home.

The meat lovers pizza is TO DIE FOR!!  Just a perfect balance of flavor between meats, sauce, & cheese.  The crust is the perfect combo of warm crunchy/chewy.  My husband has searched 35 years to find a pizza as good as he remembers from childhood (that doesn't exist anymore)...& he says this is SOOO much better!! 
The customer service is above and beyond the call.  Recently my dad was in ICU while visiting from MN.  My order was "on the house" as we have become regular customers over the last few months and just needed some comfort food in between long stretches in the hospital.
DON'T HESITATE. JUST COME HERE FOR A MEAL!! YOU WON'T BE SORRY ;)

Wow what an amazing place to eat the food is to die for and Biaggio himself is a fantastic guy! I would have to say that this place is my favorite place to eat while I'm in Vegas. Don't forget to try the zeppole those little donut things are out of this world!

do not go here !  they must have their family writing reviews because the pizza I  ordered was cold and inedible.  do not know if they can get a delivery out in less than an hour cause mine was much longer.  this is NOT good new York style pizza, im from Brooklyn and no new Yorker would serve this crap
Pizza and wings were awesome! Some of the best pizza I have ever had! Great service too!
Went in for meatball sub (which was delicious). Talked into 1/2 sub with slice of pizza. Will definitley go bsck when in area

I'm on the fence about what to give this place.  The service was good, the pizza was fine, nothing to write home about.  The garlic knots swam in butter and that was a bit of a turn off.  

If I'm in that area, it might be worth a try, but not worth driving cross town for.

Meh...  In town for a conference & ordered because of reviews.  Not impressed.  Decent, but not 5 stars!  Pizza was hot & "tasty", but didn't knock my socks off.  Wings are definitely not worth $1 each...don't order those!!!  I've had better from grocery store freezer section.  Just keeping it real.

Not sure who that Cassie C is, but it's not me or my girlfriend. My girlfriend and I eat here all the time and we love it!!! Biaggio is a super nice guy, super friendly. Great pizza!!!!!!! :) We love Biaggio's. Oh and you have to try the garlic knots... they're amazing!!!!!

To give credit where it's due I shall. The ordering process was easy online but when I selected option to pay driver upon delivery with my card, the driver arrived not knowing this was the option chosen. Disconnect somewhere. 


The email confirmation was prompt, accurate, and even provided a time of arrival. Good info. Pizza arrived a few mins early. 

However, I ordered a 16" gluten free pizza with tomato, pineapple, and jalepeños. It was bland, lacking any kind of flavor. Ingredients didn't taste fresh, yet, jalepeños were decent and the cheese was worse than the sauce. Overall not very good. 

Sorry guys, I won't order from here again.

If you think Biaggio's is all about pizza, think again!  Besides the side items like the incredible garlic knots (and I mean incredible...don't forget those when you place an order) and the chicken wings, they have amazing subs!  We ordered the Italian sub and loved it!  It has a nice kick to it and a great hint of balsamic that rounds out the flavor.  The sub was very fresh and tasty that there wasn't a spec of it left!  Keep doing what you are doing!!!

The great reviews on Yelp led my brother and I here. We were warmly welcomed by the Biaggio family. We started with garlic knots. They were tasty - warm, fresh and chewy, but those at the bottom were in a pool of butter. It was not appetizing to me, but my brother loved those drenched in all that garlicky butter. We went with a classic large pepperoni. I thought the crust was really great, crisp and chewy. And it held up well, a feat for NY Style. It was the greasiness that I didn't love. Cheese and pepperoni, should be greasy, but this was more than my arteries could handle. I'd return for veggie pizza or maybe a stromboli or calzone. I heard a waiter talking up the zeppoles for dessert. If I was ever able to save room I'd give those a whirl too.

By far the BEST Pizza in Vegas! Mr. Biaggio has a passion for food and it shows in his cooking. Give him a try and you won't be disappointed. Grab a slice, a meatball sub, and a drink and you'll enjoy the best pizzeria in town.

An excellent pizza parlor with personal attention and moderate prices. The owner check with you at your table, greets you and your family and everybody seems to love him. While we were there, a stylist from a nearby business stopped by and had a salad and some pasta. Always a good sign the neighborhood has him as a pivotal business.

There are so many pizza places in town but I will definitely be returning to Biaggio's. We came here around 1 and ordered a pepperoni pizza. It didn't take long for it to come out and it was super fresh! The two of us almost demolished a large! Joe is nice and has great customer service!

We moved from California, and had yet  needed to find a great pizza place. Thanks to yelp, we found this gem! Pizza was by far the best I've had in a long time. You can taste the freshness of the vegetables and the wings were perfect. I ordered a kids spaghetti for my son and he enjoyed it very much. Great food at a reasonable price. Family owned, so you can feel like warmth of the place. The owners were very friendly and made sure we were taken care of.

We had the Chicken parmesan with pasta and red gravy and Shrimp fettuccine Alfredo. Both were really delicious, it was my first time trying this place. It has a 41/2 star rating with hundreds of great reviews here on Yelp and I see why, this place is good. I make my Sauce from a  generations old family recipe and it takes me 41/2 - 5 hours so I'm picky but this was good I recommend you try this place and taste for yourself, and I too will return to try other items on their menu.

Service was A+ as soon as we walked in; greeted by the owner.  Food was good; ordered meat lovers pizza, a pep pizza and bbq.  Followed up with the garlic knots, antipasto salad and fried dough.  So we had a bit of it all.  The kids ate the garlic knots immediately, good thing I grabbed 2 to start with.  Kids didn't like the fried dough, thought it too sweet, but it was right up my alley, so more for the adults.  Well done guys and thanks for tossing in the kids mac and cheese (after learning my daughter just got braces and needed something soft to eat).
Place is Tits.  Super good for deliveries.  Pizza is really good and u can't help but to eat the crust.

Absolutely the best garlic knots I've had so far!!! Great thin crust pizza. I didn't have their strombolis however I did watch it go by my table and those things are huge! I love their sauce very fresh tasting very balanced sweet, tangy and garlicky! My sister had their Italian sub very tasty, fresh bread and meats and veggies. Small restaurant but great people running it very friendly and informative! They also have awesome specials! Definitely recommend! Need to go back to get my garlic knot craving fix! Lol ; )

This place is it! Food is on point meatball sandwich is bomb.the garlic knots are really GOOD! Great service & the owner came out & welcomed us.

I'm going back again and again!!!

I was visiting Las Vegas and ended up visiting this restaurant twice in 2 days. 

All of their ingredients are fresh and they don't skimp on ingredients.  The Greek salad was loaded with feta cheese and kalamata olives.

The pizza was delicious, loaded with toppings and the crust was great.  This is the best pizza I've had since I visited Long Island. 

I don't review very often but wanted to made a point of encouraging others to visit their quaint location.

First time visitor. Food was excellent, service was terrific. You gotta love it when the owner of the restaurant greets you when you walk in! The wings were very good and the garlic knots were first rate. Prices were fair. All in all I think they deliver a good value and I will be back.

Meatball Stromboli = amazing
Marinara sauce = too good
Pizza = great

His dad was from Sicily so the homemade recipes are legit. And  just now eating the cold pizza 6 hours later and it's still good.

Thanks Biaggio! You're the man!

given latest move, I spend more time at the LVAC gym at Flamingo/215 than the Eastern location.  I have a new rule - when megabucks or Powerball lotto jackpots exceed $100 million, I drive to the NV/Cali border to buy tickets.  well, they are both currently over $100 million so on Wednesday, post work out, I start the drive, but, it is lunch time and since Biaggio's is nearby, how about a few slices to go ?

I opt for the two slice soda special costing $6.  While waiting, talked to owner about how long it's been since my last visit.  The owner is a hoot - an old school guy !

the slices took a little longer than it should given they were not busy - who knows, maybe it was a fresh pie being cooked.

Anyways, the pizza was above average.  First of all, I was appreciated of having bite sized pieces of sausage on top - seems simple enough but last several pizza experiences involved "sausage strips"  not to my liking.  I really liked the crust - thin but not paper thin, had a crunch to it yet also some softness, too. could have used a tad bit more sauce but not a major issue.

Overall, worth a return if i'm hankering for pizza post-work out or in the area for other escapades.

pic included

Great tasting Pizza but not "New York Style" even though the crust tastes great it is thicker like a bread stick so I recommend getting a side of marinara sauce to dip it in. They use good quality cheese which really helps and happy to find this place.

Biaggio's catering saved my party [DEFCON 22]. There's so much more to it.  I am still so very incredibly wiped from my visit to Las Vegas.  But. What I can say now, before I update this review is: 

We had so many more guests than I'd anticipated.  Many were paleo, vegetarian, and gluten free in diet.  Biaggio's covered all of us.  He simply charged a flat rate for my group size, and said: Mal, leave your worries to us. We understand the diversity of diet, and we've got you covered.  I was skeptical, but -- O M G did Biaggio deliver above and beyond.... Yes, he did.  

For a flat catering rate, we received a greek salad, buffalo chicken wings, fried mushrooms and zucchinis, delicious gluten free pizzas, and delicious knotted pastries filled with cheese, marinara and the works!

Next DEFCON -- Biaggio, We'll see you in August.  I really hit the jackpot finding you in this wild and dusty desert.

This is a great gem and I'm glad I finally stopped in. So far the meatball sub is my favorite, the balls are so good and with the cheese its the best! The pizzas are really good too you can taste the quality in the ingredients. Mr. biaggio aims to please. If you're on this side of town you have to give them a try and I'll think you'll agree.

I would find it difficult to for me to believe that there is a better NY-style pizza in Las Vegas.  Of course, an excellent pizza starts with a wood-burning oven, and they have it.  My wife had a pepperoni & ricotta pizza & I had a white pizza.  We will definitely re-order.  They were very, very good!
Great small pizza place. Loved the Greek salad.  Good crust and sauce. Big portioned pizza. Good value.  Very good service

Recently my family  purchased pizzas  from Biaggios and I  must say the staff was very friendly. This was just complimentary to the food. The pizzas  were fresh and delicious. Definitely worth the price!!!Certainly  will pass this gem of a place to friends.
What a great little pizzeria!! Their pizza pie was tasty loved the sauce.  I really want to go back and try the garlic knots they looked amazing.
Definitely the best place for pizza. They have great customer service and the owner is young handsome and shaved.  A must try place.

They are the best pizza place in the whole Las Vegas. This is my first time to post here since I only use Yelp to look for restaurants and just check a good place to go to. I'm a regular customer since I love their Pizza supreme. I've been going to them at least twice a month for the last 7 months. Everytime I order, the service is great and as usual the food is great too! Today, under some unusual circumstances, there was something wrong with my order. I somewhat got the wrong order and I was not able to check what I got before I left. When I got home, I got the wrong pizza. 

I called them and was able to talk to John. He apologized and told me he'll deliver the food. But I hesitated and told him I will drive back. As soon as I got there, John gave me my order and apologized. And not just that, he said he voided the charge on my card earlier when I paid and also gave me a $25 dollar gift certificate. I told them they didn't have to. I was not even mad. I will always come back for their food! But they insisted. These guys are amazing! Not only they have the best food but they have the best interest on all their customers. When I went home, I couldn't believe how John (probably he's the owner) was really nice. No wonder all the great reviews here are consistent. By the way, order their chicken wings. It's the best too!

First allow me to say that the THANK YOU for the hospitality to my man Joe!!!  This place puts the words home and family before the word business.  The food is a must!  Just one taste and you too will be a habitual visitor (or like me, stop in whenever you're in Vegas - you'll go home a winner!)
Staff was patient on the phone placing order and more wonderful when I arrived to pick up the food. GREAT fresh light pizza,  the dough was fresh and all the food was cooked perfectly.
Best pizza that I've had since moving to Las Vegas. The Buffalo chicken pizza is awesome!

Went here today to pick up a pizza (my favorite food)  When I called to place the order the person that answered the phone just said: "Hello?" Instead of a proper greeting like most pizza places would offer.  It's not a big deal though because the pizza was really good.  The price was high though... $20 for a 2 topping med. I asked if there was any specials and they said: "No."  I personally like to feel like I'm getting a good deal but no deals on pizza here.  It's all full price.  The pizza was good and was ready on time without having to wait.  For that I'm thankful and may go back some day if I feel like splurging with family or friends that want really good tasting pizza without waiting for a long time.

We ordered the Garlic knots, the antipasto salad, and an order of onion rings. The garlic knots, no exaggeration were in a pool of garlic oil about 1/4-1/2 inch deep. The onion rings were completely soggy, and not even cooked really. This I expect was due to them not taking enough time to let the deep fryer hit the proper temp, or they just pulled them out too early. 

The salad was not at all like in the picture, and overall wasn't flavorful. The whole order was a huge disappointment because I had to set the onion rings and knots onto paper towels to drain some of the grease, then heat up the oven, and actually cook them to the point they weren't sopping with grease. There wasn't much we could do to improve the salad so we just ate it. Overall it was a solid 1 star except the delivery was pretty quick. There is also a very subtle $4 delivery fee believe it or not, which I thought was ridiculous and if they had told me that or given me a total on the phone I would have just canceled the order right then and there. Between tip and delivery fee and tax I paid almost 100% extra! Wow, not going back, and back off of the garlic oil that is just insane.

Great place! The food is good, good portions, good price. The place was clean and intimate. We had our two ( loud ) kids with us eating in, and the atmosphere was perfect. The people who served us was very friendly and always made sure we had everything we needed. 

Simple, delicious and cozy.

Next time we are back in this area we will make sure to come again.

Yelp find:  We ordered the plain chicken wings and the garlic knots. Both were good, a little salty (I think most food not made at home is salty - I rarely use salt), but well prepared otherwise. The garlic knots were soft and warm and had the perfect chewy consistency.  The chicken wings were crispy/crunchy on the outside and tender on the inside.  The order was take-out, as we planned to have girls' night in. The order was easy to place, the food was exactly on time, and as soon as I entered I was greeted.  The place had several patrons who looked content.  I won't be ordering pizza (lactose - no thanks - they sprinkle the knots with a bit of cheese, but it is easy to pick off or ask them to leave it off), but the wings again - yes.

Dropping stars for new management....the women behind the counter were not very friendly or welcoming with zero customers in the place and the garlic knots tasted stale and rancid. Biaggio would not be pleased.

Hands down favorite place in Vegas for many reasons.  The food is amazing!  The price os right  and everyone who works there is AMAZING!  You really can't go wrong!!!  Also having gluten free options is awesome!  My favorite thing is the garlic knots, or the ceaser salad....well really everything I have tried is so good I can't pick a favorite.  Try the meatball sub and the wings too!  I actually have never liked meatball subs until my husband had ne try his!  So so so good!

Some of the best pizza there is. The whole team is so sweet and attentive. Not to mention fast and friendly. There is salad zero is so fresh and they have so many toppings and not to mention the ranch is so delicious thank you so much for the best food.

DICE DEALERS GIVE HONEST REVIEWS................went to biaggios a month ago,got the mush/saus....it was good,but crust was alittle thick,i asked if they make a thinner crust they said yes
Last nite had a thin mush/saus.......it was great!...only better pizza i ever had was in rome,italy....everyone is friendly,go give it a shot!

Sunshine n White pizza r my fave!  Love to get the lunch special for 6$; 2 slices and u choose whichever with chicken, pepperoni whatever ur little hear desires and it comes with a big gulp sized drink! Normally end up taking a slice home with me! Staffs amazing!

I guess Las Vegas Natives must have some low standards for Pizza based on the ratings. I ordered a Pepperoni Pizza and Garlic Knots...some people mentioned these being the best they ever had, these were actually the worst I ever had, very dough and bland. The Pizza may have been even worse though, I like some grease on my Pizza, key word some...this pizza was drenched in it, making the Pizza very soggy. The cheese taste was pretty good and I can't complain about the Pepperoni, but the crust was totally uninspiring, very tasteless. I recently moved here so I can't compare it to other local Pizza places, but hoping this is not the par for the course here in Las Vegas.

Pizza was great.  Service was excellent. Chicken wings were as if the best fried chicken had babies with great Buffalo wings -- YUMMY!  Now, shall we talk Garlic knots?  I am typically not a fan.  But these are welcome to my dinner anytime!  They had bite to them without being rubbery and they were buttery and parmesean-y and, just plain ol' good!  They deliver anywhere in the valley which is a treat cause we live on the opposite side of town and it would be a bummer if we only got to partake on haircut days (salon is across the street). The best part?  the food actually came out looking like it did in the pictures!  Very much looking forward to our next experience with the owner, the staff and, oh yea, the food!

This pizza is tasty high quailty ingredients cheese is amazing! Absolutely FRESH veggies! Little Caesars form employee  sorry dont agree with your review. I'm a mushroom liver and there are fresh in fact they are mini portobellos! Anyhow family owned nice people with good pizza ,wings and decent pasta wasn't crazy about marinara but thats my personsl opion since sauce I make is little sweeter less acidic and less thick. Supoort local family pizzeria's $ this is a good one. Closed on Sundays

Found this place on Yelp, in search of a new pizza spot. As soon as we (my BF and I) walked in we got greeted. 

We ordered the garlic knots, and the meat lovers pizza with ricotta cheese, mushrooms, and green peppers added. We received our garlic knots first and they were absolutely delicious! I love that they leave the garlic sauce sauce at the bottom so you can dip it in there too or in the marinara  sauce! 

We got our pizza and let me just say this is how pizza should be! They are definitely generous with their toppings, the sausage is delicious as well as everything else. 

Definitely a place to come back to! 

Service was amazing too kind server and the owner was there I think.

Best pizza that I can find in Las Vegas! Coming in from the East Coast I was in search of the perfect Pie and Biaggio's does not disappoint. We tried a few others on the West side and have come full circle. The staff/owner are/is very friendly and I get the impression that they are appreciative of my business. This is now our go to pizzeria.

This restaurant is such a find!!! Everything is freshly made, even the salad dressing! The veggie salad was tangy and delicious. The garlic knots come out in a pool of luscious, warm garlic butter. The pizza is to die for (we had the meat lovers and the sunshine).  The greatest surprise of the day was the warm, fresh zeppole. We will be back again and again. Fantastic!

Phenomenal pizza, unbelievable garlic knots, and a very friendly atmosphere. If you really like really good, no great pizza, this is the place for you. And chances are if you don't order something, they may give it to you anyway. Order a medium? Get a large instead. Can't guarantee that but that's what happened to us. Outstanding New York pizza!!!!
Hands down the best pizza in town. The owner is one of the nicest people I have ever met and treats everyone like family. Will 100% be getting all my pizza and wings from here from now on.

This place is amazing!! The food is mouth watering and the service is wonderful!!! We order something different every time and it's always tasty!! We keep going back because this place never fails to delight!

We found this hidden gem one night. We tried a variety of food...garlic knots, pizza, spaghetti, wings, and even a philly cheese steak sandwich. All were amazing!  We spent 4 years living in Europe and this restaurant is the real deal! But the best part was how we were treated. They immediately took care of us and talked to us like family. We will definitely be back!

I really wanted to give Biaggio a good review but unfortunately, they did not pull through on our large delivery order. I placed this order weeks in advance and come the day of my party the delivery was disorganized. 

First off, I was promised that for the price paid, I would receive enough food to feed my party. Plus, I was told that our delivery would be on time. He was 15 minutes late and we had to walk down to meet him near the parking garage to carry all of the food and drinks up to our hotel. By the time we ate our food, the pizza was dry and luke warm. What was the purpose of the delivery fee? 

Second, our order incorrect. The salad that he told us would feed enough people ...well...didn't. He said he would send garlic knots...he didn't. They didn't send enough soda liters...and for a group of 13 people, we got 6 forks. This was such a huge disappointment because Biaggo had promised an amazing dining experience. 

To make up for it, they offered to send us all of the missing items AND free dessert. THEY NEVER CAME! 

My fellow yelpers may say that their pizzeria is good, but I would avoid delivery, especially to the strip and on a big order. It just seems like too much for them to handle.

I had a calzone (or stromboli) - I don't know the difference delivered by Postmates.

Quality was excellent!   You can tell they use higher end products than most pizza places.

I for sure recommend.

maybe we came in on the wrong day and time, but since reviews were so nice and this place is rated 4.5 stars we had our high hopes coming in to pick up our order. first off it was not busy maybe one table and we walked in all excited and not one person said hello. we said hi kindly and excitedly and got a 'hey' from like a bunch of workers staring at us. my bf than says here to pick up  our order? the casher goes, YEAH HOLD ON IM PUTTING SOMETHING IN. dang, sorrrrrrrrry! so we stood there just waiting and minutes later he finally goes whats your name my bf answered steven than he turns to the other faces standing around and tells them to get our order. there was an older man behind us sitting down he looked nice and was prob the owner, he than says hi to us and thanks us for coming in which was cool. but at that point we already felt the extremely rude vibe from everyone working up front. thats the service part, food part i got the antipasto with grilled chicken salad. grilled chicken was extremely overcooked. i could barely bite it very dry. salad wasn't that great either i ended up giving more than half to my dogs (no lie)... pizza wise my bf got half supreme and half pepperoni. him and baby bros said it was pretty good. i had two bites and agree it was decent but at that point the salad already had me feeling effy inside. i ended up eating cereal afters to fulfill my hunger. would not be returning here, sorry!

My favorite pizza place in town. The pizza is delicious, they definitely know their stuff. Garlic knots are perfection. 
Biaggio the owner is absolutely amazing, so kind. 


The food+the great customer service= me telling everyone I know.
The food here was delicious. The service was outstanding. The Stromboli was cooked to perfection and it tasted like it. There was plenty left over and we can't wait to have more!!
